title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Wednesday, 6 April 2016 - BBC News
summary: council says sorry after cat 's body thrown in bin .
further arrests following chelmsford knife fight .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's about it from us at essex live today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back from 08:00 tomorrow with the latest news for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : tonight will be cold and breezy , but mainly dry
text: the showers from earlier will clear through this evening to leave many places dry overnight .
it will be windier and colder than recent nights , with patchy frost possible .
minimum temperature : 4c ( 39f ) .
tomorrow will be rather cloudy , with some patchy rain during the morning .
you can get the latest weather forecast here .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: your sporadic sunshine and showers
text: it 's a sporadic mixture of sunshine and heavy showers today .
this was sent to us by alan conran , who said there was `` clouds rolling in over dovercourt '' .
if you 'd like to share a photo with us you can email it , tweet it , or post it on to our facebook page .

documents.title: £ 2.5m canvey boatyard goes up for sale
text: those with dreams of owning their own essex boatyard could be in luck - if they 're able to afford a £ 2.5m price tag .
the dauntless boatyard near canvey island has recently come on to the market .
built in the 1940 's the plot stretches over six acres .
if you 're wondering what you 'd get for your money , the site includes a warehouse , office , 800m ( 2624ft ) in moorings and even its own cafe .

documents.title: headlines : bus cash pedestrian suffers life-changing injuries cctv released in theydon bois murder investigation
text: here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : one lane closed on southbound m11 at bishops stortford
text: one lane is closed on the m11 southbound , just after j8 at bishops stortford , due to a crash involving two cars and a van .
you can find the latest travel for essex here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: hundreds of 'out of control ' deer at risk of being culled in rural brentwood
text: hundreds of deer could be culled because their numbers are `` out of control '' in rural brentwood .
author: Brentwood Gazette

documents.title: pedestrian suffers 'life-changing injuries ' in bus crash
text: a pedestrian hit by a bus in colchester earlier this morning suffered life-changing injuries , police say .
the man , believed to be in his 30s , was flown to addenbrooke 's hospital in cambridge following the incident that happened at about 10:00 in hythe hill .
essex police is now asking any witnesses to get in touch .

documents.title: torrential rain calls off essex cricket game
text: it was torrential rain in chelmsford two hours ago now look at it .
believe it or not , today 's t20 v @ twitterid was called off after torrential rainfall and high winds !
@ twitterid @ twitterid did anyone do a duckworth lewis to see who would have won ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid crazy decision , i thought it was a bit premature .

documents.title: cctv released in theydon bois murder investigation
text: police are looking to trace a pedestrian and the occupants of a car who may be able to assist them with a murder investigation .
maria bryne , 34 , was found at a property in morgan crescent , theydon bois , on 13 february .
darren byrne , 39 , of the same address , has been charged with her murder .
essex police says the cctv images were taken around the time of the incident .

documents.title: council says opening in leigh 'is not a sinkhole '
text: southend borough council has taken to twitter to `` allay any fears '' over a hole that opened up in leigh broadway earlier today .
the authority says it now believes the crater is a `` small void above a gas pipe '' and not a sinkhole .
the road remains partially blocked while engineers try to fix the problem .
hole in # leigh update .
just to allay any fears this is not a 'sink hole ' we believe it just a small void above a gas pipe # southend
@ twitterid @ twitterid a bit harsh calling leigh a void above a gas pipe .

documents.title: lucky southend pub-goer escapes ceiling collapse
text: a pub-goer got more than a packet of peanuts in southend last night , when the ceiling collapsed on to a table she had moved from just moments earlier .
the drama unfolded in the alex pub in southend on tuesday night , yoursouthend reported .
kayleigh johnson , 28 , said she heard a `` massive crash '' before the ceiling came `` tumbling down '' .
no-one was injured in the incident , and the pub 's owners said specialist contractors were assessing the damage .

documents.title: further arrests made in chelmsford knife fight investigation
text: police have made two further arrests in connection with a large fight in chelmsford on monday night .
officers were first called to reports of a disturbance in readers court at about 21:30 .
seven men were initially arrested - three of whom had stab wounds .
the force says six of those detained have now been released on bail .
the two latest suspects , aged 28 and 29 , are currently being questioned .
the final suspect remains in hospital .

documents.title: danny cowley : braintree boss relishing play-off challenge
text: braintree manager danny cowley said the task ahead of his team is `` a brilliant challenge '' after the defeat at barrow .
the iron are currently sixth in the national league , one point and one place outside the play-off spots .
`` i thought we asked a lot of questions of a very good barrow team , '' cowley told bbc essex .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : it 'll be windy this afternoon with some showers around
text: this afternoon we 'll see a mixture of sunny spells and showers .
some of the showers may be heavy with a risk of hail and thunder .
it will be quite windy as well , which will make it feel colder than recent days .
maximum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
a full weather forecast can be found here .

documents.title: large group of youths cause distrubance in waltham abbey mcdonalds
text: there was a large disturbance in a mcdonalds in waltham abbey last night , police say .
officers attended the restaurant on highbridge retail park at about 18:55 after reports of an altercation involving 20 youths .
those involved are said to have left the scene and no criminal offences were committed .

documents.title: english democrat robin tilbrook pulls out as police commissioner candidate
text: one of the candidates for the police and crime commissioner ( pcc ) elections in essex has withdrawn from the race .
robin tilbrook , from the english democrats , says he will now be supporting the ukip candidate bob spink , and has even seconded his nomination .
so far five candidates have said they are standing in the pcc election , which will be held on 5 may .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : man hit by bus in colchester image of potential john palmer murder witnesses released
text: here are the top stories from essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: owners 'scared of letting cat out of house ' after shooting
text: the owners of a cat that survived being shot in the head say they are scared of letting him out of the house .
the feline returned to his home in rivenhall last month with an air rifle bullet lodged in his head .
his owner , who does not want to be named , said : `` it 's awful to think that someone would do this to a defenceless animal .
doing something like this is absolutely not acceptable . ''

documents.title: your a grey day on canvey island
text: it 's not the brightest of days today is it ?
we think bbc weather watcher tornado alley captured the mood perfectly with this shot from canvey island .
he reported showers with temperatures at about 10c ( 50f ) down along the south essex coast .
you can always share your photos with us via email , twitter , or facebook .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: cyclist dies after being hit by a car
text: a cyclist from essex who was hit by a car in dorset has died in hospital .
police said richard ellis , 58 , was injured in a crash on the a352 in wareham on sunday .
he was taken by air ambulance to southampton general hospital but died yesterday .
mr ellis was hit by a nissan driven by a 26-year-old woman .
no arrests have been made .

documents.title: engineers on site at leigh broadway sinkhole
text: engineers are currently dealing with a sinkhole that has closed part of the broadway in leigh-on-sea .
southend borough council says the hole , which opened up outside clements arcade , is likely to affect traffic along the road all day .
regular travel updates can be found here .

documents.title: man airlifted to hospital after he is hit by a bus in colchester
text: a man has been airlifted to hospital after he was hit by a bus in colchester this morning .
essex police says hythe hill is closed following the incident that happened just before 10:00 this morning .
the male pedestrian , aged in his 30s , has been taken to addenbrooke 's hospital in cambridge with life-threatening injuries .

documents.title: cat shot in the head with an air rifle
text: a cat has survived being shot in the head with an air rifle in rivenhall .
the rspca says the black and white moggy was discovered with the pellet still lodged `` in his skull '' when he returned home on 22 march .
adam jones from the charity said : `` he was incredibly lucky because a few millimetres in a different direction it would have gone through his ear or eye and could have killed him . ''

documents.title: john 'goldfinger ' palmer murder investigation : image shows potential witnesses
text: police investigating the murder of a notorious criminal in essex have released an image of two potential witnesses .
john `` goldfinger '' palmer , 65 , who allegedly amassed a fortune in a time-share scam , was shot six times in the chest at his south weald home in june .
officers want to speak to two women seen jogging in weald country park , who `` may hold vital information about who killed john '' .

documents.title: terrapin rescued from essex river
text: say hello to crouchy he is starting a new life after being found dumped in a river in burnham-on-crouch on monday .
terry joyce , from the river crouch conservation group , found the terrapin while surveying the area for a clean-up event later this month .
terrapins ' natural home is the swamps of the us .
but a rise in 1990s to keep the reptiles as pets resulted in many being dumped into lakes when they grew too big .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: mcdonald 's in brentwood to serve final burger this evening
text: mcdonald 's in brentwood high street will close its doors for the final time this evening after 30 years serving the town .
author: Brentwood Gazette

documents.title: keen shortlisted for manager of the month award
text: the boss of league one strugglers colchester has been nominated for a manager of the month award .
kevin keen was shortlisted after the u 's up 10 points in march , including wins at bradford and coventry .
walsall 's jon whitney , rochdale 's keith hill and barnsley 's paul heckingbottom have also been nominated .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: council says sorry after cat 's body thrown in bin
text: colchester borough council says it is `` extremely regrettable '' that a pet cat 's body was thrown into a bin by park rangers .
the daily gazette first reported that zelda was discarded by staff after she was found dead in lower castle park on sunday morning .
her owner told bbc essex she was `` disgusted '' .
a spokesman from the council said : `` we offer our sincerest apologies to zelda 's owners for any distress they have been caused . ''

documents.title: extra police patrols following chelmsford knife fight
text: police patrols have been stepped up in chelmsford after three men were stabbed in a large fight on monday night .
readers court was cordoned off for most of yesterday while officers investigated the scene .
six of the seven suspects arrested , all of whom are from the city , have been released on police bail .
one man remains in hospital .

documents.title: why are junior doctors striking ?
text: our colleagues at bbc health have produced a helpful article explaining why junior doctors are going on a 48-hour strike starting today , over their dispute with the government about a new contract .
the government has described the current arrangements as `` outdated '' and `` unfair '' , pointing out they were introduced in the 1990s .
ministers drew up plans to change the contract in 2012 , but talks broke down in 2014 .
sticking points for the junior doctors include changes to salary and weekend working conditions .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: essex operations cancelled as junior doctors begin 48-hour strike
text: a number of routine operations are being cancelled across essex today as junior doctors stage their latest 48-hour strike in a contract dispute .
local hospitals have told bbc essex it 's unclear how many workers will be joining the national walk-out , which begun at 08:00 .
bosses at nhs england said the continued disruption was `` deeply regrettable '' .

documents.title: weather : patchy rain clearing to sunshine and blustery showers . becoming colder
text: it will be rather cloudy at first with some rain possible for a time , clearing to a rather cool , blustery afternoon with sunshine and scattered showers .
maximum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast here .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : essex operations cancelled as junior doctors strike colchester council apologises over dead cat
text: here are the top stories from essex this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to wednesday 's local live page
text: good morning and welcome to local live in essex .
until 18:00 we 'll bring you all the latest news for the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
